Snapping his fingers your guide gets your attention back. "Alright this is where you'll be picking up your missions from here on out, At least until you advance far enough to only answer to the higher ups. Each mission has a rank from D to S indicating the difficulty level presented. There are many different types of missions for you to take.

first and foremost being assassinations. In this mission, You need to track down and eliminate your prime target. The higher the level, the more guards the target and possibly an indication of the target being well trained. For example, a rank D wouldn't be trained in self-defense or have many bodyguards."

"Next we have Rescue missions, Theses are also easy to understand as well. In this mission instead finding and killing your target, you are to escort them to an extraction point where they will be brought back to safety. Make sure to be on your guard on these as many places are filled with traps and guards as indicated by the mission ranking."

"Next mission type is the escort or bodyguard mission. This is a variant of the rescue mission but instead of escorting the target to safety, your job will be to escort them from point A to point B. The higher the missions, the more assassins you may face on the way to your destination and the longer the distance you will have to travel."

"Longer missions require places to stop and rest. Make sure that the enemy ninja does not get to your target and have their way with them, remember we are not the only clan trained in sex-craft and ninjutsu. They will undoubtedly attack you as well so keep your guard up at all times."

"next is infiltration, these are usually longer mission where you must slip into a place under a false identity in order to retrieve information or to sabotage something in a rival faction. The nature of these missions make then inherently harder than most others as one small slip up may lead to your cover being blown, with will most like lead to your death. Worse yet they may torture you for information and try to convert you to their cause. Breaking and selling former ninja to sex slaves is also a new punishment that has recently surfaced."

"Last but not least are the war effort missions, These are the most dangerous and should only be taken after extreme preparations and training.
